net: usb: ax88179_178a: Fix packet receiving

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.19.251 by commit 5fabd32fd5492675e33a7ca972ac158e7b7361ee, it was introduced in version v4.19.231 by commit 1668781ed24da43498799aa4f65714a7de201930. For more details please see the references link.
